instructions: Click the user icon in the top right-hand corner of the browser. Click Sign in to Chrome . When prompted enter your email address and password. You ll see a screen letting you know you re turning Chrome Sync on. Click OK got it .

Tap the menu (three dots) button. Tap Settings . You should see the Google account you ve logged into to set up your Android phone. Tap Continue as [Name] . You ll see a screen letting you know you re turning Chrome Sync on. Click OK Got it.
Open Chrome on your phone. Tap the menu (three dots) button. Tap Recent tabs . You ll see a list of the recent tabs you ve opened in Chrome, with the last one at the bottom of the list.
Open Chrome on your computer. Click History > Recently Visited. You should see the site you were visiting on your phone listed on your computer.

Daniel Escasa May 2, 2018 at 2:25 pm Firefox Quantum has this, and may even make things easier, provided you've "logged on" to the Quantum on your other devices. The three dots beside the Pocket icon? Tap on those, and the last item there is Send Tab to other device Reply
